name: unsterile
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not completely clean and not free from dirt or bacteria: The disease can be transmitted if unsterile needles are reused. The mouth is an unsterile environment. Opposite
sterile (CLEAN)
More examplesFewer examplesUnsterile tattooing equipment can transmit serious diseases, including tetanus, hepatitis B, and HIV.Because methadone is taken orally, it also reduces the risk of infection caused by using unsterile needles.Surgical instruments must be replaced or re-sterilized if they are handled in an unsterile manner or are allowed to touch an unsterile surface.Take care not to contaminate the jam jars with utensils or any other unsterile object.
